targets.query: SELECT value not null as value FROM "BabyCamLatency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "HandySLatency" WHERE $timeFilter  AND (value > 1)  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "DesktopLatency" WHERE $timeFilter AND (value > 110 )  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
